name: Brazier for the Sky
description: Brazier for the Sky is a fun, simple 2D platformer game where you control an animated brazier that is trying to keep its fire alight so it can reignite the sun. Along the way, it must dodge the rain, rising water, ice, clouds, and lightning. This colorful game gets progressively more difficult the longer it is played and features five different tilesets that allow for new challenges in gameplay. Can you overcome the storm and reignite the sun?
